meanings.definition: Details or rules that are specific to a particular subject or activity.
meanings.sent1: Understanding all the technicalities of the game can help you improve your skills.
meanings.sent2: He got caught up in the technicalities of the contract and lost sight of the bigger picture.
meanings.sent3: The lawyer cleverly navigated through the legal technicalities to win the case.
meanings.sent4: She struggled to grasp the technicalities of computer programming, but eventually succeeded.
meanings.sent5: The book explained the technicalities of gardening in a simple and easy-to-understand way.

meanings.definition: Minor points or aspects of a situation that are often overlooked.
meanings.sent1: Don't get too caught up in the technicalities and remember the main goal.
meanings.sent2: While discussing the project, they focused on the big ideas and ignored the technicalities.
meanings.sent3: The team spent hours debating the technicalities of the plan, forgetting the deadline.
meanings.sent4: She always pays attention to the technicalities that others tend to ignore.
meanings.sent5: His success was not due to luck but to his attention to the technicalities of the process.
